column4: Can someone look at this picture of my install error and tell me what the hell is going on? http://sheldonmsa.org/ub_err1.jpg
: it sure is... I tried over 3 times to install using a CD and a DVD
have you checked the integrity of the install disc? has this happened more than once?
: yes it has happened over 3 times now with a CD and a DVD
what sort of machine are you on?
: no cheap hardware all custom built
and you're using the 64 bit install disc/kernel?
: I have both the Install CD and DVD same thing
did you build it? has it run any other OSes?
: yes I built the machine or are you talking about something else... It's been running XP for over 6 months and it run SUSE and Knoppix no problem
:( looks like this is a problem with ubu (possibly fixed by later kernel updates, but that won't help you install)
: bleh... I guess I should install SUSE again or do you know any similar distro to Ubuntu
pragmatically I'd say work with SuSe if SUSE works with your hardware... otherwise, you could install a /minimal/ debian set up and try to convert that to ubuntu
IE, install just enough for net access and a text editor, then add the ubuntu repositories to your sources.list
